titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison -- TOM, a mulatto, aged about 42 years, 5 feet 6 1/2 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. Goff. VINEY, a mulattress, aged about 40 years, 5 feet 2 inches high ; says she belongs to Mr. Keller. REBECCA, a mulattress, aged about 48 years, 5 feet 1/2 inch high ; says she belongs to Mr. Levy. CHARLES MORRISON, a mulatto, aged about 40 years, 5 feet 3 inches high ; says he is free, but supposed a slave. The owners will please comply with the law respecting them. J. WORRELL, Warden. NewOrleans, December 30, 1851. d301aw3n
mods.note: Mr. Goff; Mr. Keller; Mr. Levy
Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
